summary: Adds a big dungeon with 20 bosses, 2 armor sets, a dozen of weapons and much more!
descriptionHtml:
Dungeons : The Forgotten Snows
By Lord Dagobert
May 31st 2012
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7gfRIR7Rj7A[/youtube]

[Version 1.2] :
4 new exit points, so you don\'t have to walk all the way back
Corrects a few bugs
Companions will follow you in the Dungeon

The Forgotten Snows, a forgotten realm where evil forces hide...


This mod adds:
-1 Huge dungeon, divided in 7 interior cells
-20 Bosses (check at the end for the list)
-2 craftable and improvable armor sets, The Forgotten and the Keeper\'s armor
-A new insignia system : Each time you kill a boss, you will gather
a Forgotten Ore. Collect them to craft brand new items!
-A dozen of epic weapons
-Random Loots
-Epic Fights

All the enemies are respawn, so you can do the dungeon again if you want to.

The entrance of the Dungeon is near Markarth Stables, follow the road and you
can\'t miss it.


If you ecounter a bug, a problem or you just have a question,
send me a mail! I\'ll be happy to help you :) .




Bosses List:

Entrance (1st cell)
-Plagued Wraith
-Forgotten Atronach

Boneyard (2nd cell)
-The Bonelords (x2)
-Master of the Graves

Thorns (3rd cell)
-Abomination (x2)
-Deadly Spriggan (x2)
-Queen of Thorns

Magic Halls (4th cell)
-Snow Troll
-The Gravedigger
-Rotten Lord
-Corpsekeeper

Bloody Mine (5th cell)
-Stonecrab
-FleshEater
-Master of the Marsh

Cursed Halls (6th cell)
-Ancient Wolf
-The Brewmaster

Twisted Orb (7th cell)
-Twisted Shade
author: Lord Dagobert
